en.title: AI/ML Intern
en.text: Contributed to real-world AI and machine learning projects by developing, training, and optimizing data-driven models to solve complex business and analytical problems in a collaborative industry environment.
list: Worked on end-to-end machine learning pipelines including data preprocessing, feature engineering, model training, and evaluation
Implemented and fine-tuned supervised and unsupervised learning models for prediction, classification, and pattern recognition tasks
Applied Python-based ML libraries to build scalable and efficient AI solutions
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical AI/ML solutions
Conducted model performance analysis and optimization to improve accuracy and efficiency
Documented workflows, experiments, and results to support knowledge sharing and project continuity

en.title: AI Intern
en.text: Contributed to the project "From Alt-text to Real-context", focusing on integrating Large Language Models and advanced AI technologies to transform image-based inputs into meaningful, context-aware textual outputs.
list: Designed and implemented backend workflows using Large Language Model APIs for image understanding and text generation
Integrated ChatOpenAI and Google Gemini APIs to enable multimodal AI capabilities
Connected AI-driven backend services with a Next.js frontend for seamless user interaction
Optimized API responses for accuracy, latency, and contextual relevance
Collaborated on system design to ensure scalable and modular AI integration

en.title: Machine Learning Intern
en.text: Completed a one-month machine learning internship, gaining hands-on experience by developing and deploying predictive models for real-world healthcare and business use cases.
list: Built a Diabetes Prediction model using patient health data to support early risk assessment
Developed an IPL Match Winner Prediction system using historical match and team performance data
Created a Car Price Prediction model based on vehicle features and market trends
Implemented a Breast Cancer Detection model using medical datasets for classification and diagnosis support
Deployed interactive machine learning applications using Streamlit for user-friendly model interaction
Performed data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation to improve prediction accuracy

en.title: Machine Learning Intern
en.text: Completed a four-week machine learning internship, gaining practical experience by building and evaluating diverse predictive and classification models using real-world datasets.
list: Developed a House Price Prediction model using regression techniques on structured housing datasets
Implemented Mall Customer Segmentation using clustering algorithms to identify customer behavior patterns
Built an Animal Prediction system using classification models trained on labeled image and tabular data
Created a Hand Gesture Recognition model leveraging computer vision techniques and image-based datasets
Utilized Kaggle datasets for data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model validation
Evaluated model performance using appropriate metrics to ensure reliability and accuracy

en.title: Machine Learning Intern
en.text: Completed a one-month machine learning internship, gaining practical experience by applying predictive and recommendation models to real-world hospitality and location-based analytics use cases.
list: Developed a Restaurant Rating Prediction model using historical review and rating datasets
Built a Hotel Recommendation system leveraging user preferences and similarity-based approaches
Implemented Cuisine Classification models to categorize restaurants based on menu and metadata features
Performed Location-Based Analysis to identify geographic trends and customer behavior patterns
Applied data preprocessing and feature engineering techniques on predefined datasets
Evaluated model performance using appropriate metrics to ensure accuracy and reliability
